a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Trade in services (exports plus imports) as share of GDP, 1970 to
Sum of service exports and imports divided by the value of GDP, all in current U.S. dollars.
Data source: IMF Balance of Payments Statistics, OECD, and World Bank (2025)
